Description: A large mummified crocodile with over 20 mummified infant crocodiles mounted on reeds adhering to its back; whole coated with a black resin. Traces of linen wrappings remain on the bodies.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Kom Ombo, Temple to Sobek and Horus
Dimensions: Height: 46.50 centimetres (Overall measurement including handling board and wheels)
Condition: fair - tip of tail broken off - thus 2 items
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Jacques Jean Marie de Morgan
